start.text: You wake up in a dark forest. Two paths lie before you.

left_path.text: The left path leads you to an ancient ruin. A door stands before you.

right_path.text: You follow the right path and find a calm river. It looks peaceful.

inside_ruin.text: Inside, you find a glowing artifact. As you reach out, light fills your vision.

river_drink.text: The water is cool and refreshing. You feel renewed.

cross_river.text: You cross safely and see a village in the distance. Maybe youâ€™ll find help there.

end.text: Your journey for now has ended. The forest whispers your name as you fade away...
